message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,250,000. This is a fair price considering its value to both of us. I believe this will be a mutually beneficial deal. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider this counteroffer?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,150,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,200,000, which is still a fair price considering the value of this product. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're willing to accept.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,175,000. This is my final counteroffer. Can you consider it?
